name: gldt-monorepo
description: GLDT frontend app and GLDT canister
author: Bochsler Consulting

scripts.build: npm run build:back && npm run build:frontends
scripts.build:frontends: npm run build:swap_app && npm run build:landing && npm run build:explorer
scripts.build:back: scripts/build-canister.sh gldt_core && scripts/build-canister.sh gldt_core gldt_fee_compensation && npm run build:candid && npm run build:declarations
scripts.lint: npm run lint:back && npm run lint:frontends
scripts.lint:frontends: npm run lint:swap_app && npm run lint:landing && npm run lint:explorer
scripts.start: dfx stop && dfx start --background --clean && npm run deploy
scripts.test: echo "No tests yet! Please write some unit tests!"
scripts.postinstall: rustup update; rustup component add clippy; echo 'If installing locally, you should also ensure that ic-wasm is installed (cargo install ic-wasm), as well as wasmtime (see https://wasmtime.dev ).'
